name: Elzzuc
description:
Elzzuc is a cube puzzle game wherein you control a cube to complete the puzzles. A great challenge for brainer as well as no brainer people. Many different levels to explore. I hope you find it somewhat interesting.

If you want more puzzles and also your own puzzle to be added please contact:  nexxed@astrotale-games.ml. You will see your name in the respective puzzle that you have designed for players.

Also Elzzuc is reverse of Cuzzle which is a portmanteau of Cube and Puzzle xD. 

Have fun.

Subtlesweetness!
